name: Potato Bumper Dash
description:
Challenge your friends on this frenetic arcade vehicle battle arena shooter!!! Features

- Local Split Screen Multiplayer Game

- Duke it out with up to 4 players

- Easy to learn controls

- Skill based gameplay advanced players will learn to master

- Innovative vehicle handling with advanced "Dash Mode" (Hold L1), allowing to chain consecutive dashes in any direction

- Play as any of the six 80's pop culture characters from this alternative timeline!

- Play with any type of Gamepad! 

Let those Potatos rip in any of the four neon battle arenas

- Neon Valley

- West Land

- Mission Control

- Trippin' Tokyo

Follow us on Twitter:

@JoaquinRossiCa

@PotatoBumprDash
